top_comments.comment: "Your prayer always given me strength " heart touching word by our prime minister.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Modi invited the Pope to India!  After the political accusations of harshness against minorities, including Christians, that's major news!
Sir Modi ji U r indeed blessed. You achieved your Goal in Life. God bless.🙏
Sir Modi ji you look smart. I admire your sense of dressing. U always dress smartly. 🙏
God bless our Honourable PM Shri. Modi ji. Very good gesture.
